org.mockito.verification

接口 VerificationMode

  • 所有已知子接口:
    VerificationAfterDelay, VerificationWithTimeout
    所有已知实现类:
    After, AtLeast, AtMost, Calls, Description, InOrderWrapper, MockAwareVerificationMode, NoMoreInteractions, Only, Timeout, Times, VerificationOverTimeImpl, VerificationWrapper, VerificationWrapperInOrderWrapper

    public interface VerificationMode
    Allows verifying that certain behavior happened at least once / exact number of times / never. E.g: 
    
 verify(mock, times(5)).someMethod("was called five times");

 verify(mock, never()).someMethod("was never called");

 verify(mock, atLeastOnce()).someMethod("was called at least once");

 verify(mock, atLeast(2)).someMethod("was called at least twice");

 verify(mock, atMost(3)).someMethod("was called at most 3 times");
    times(1) is the default and can be omitted

    See examples in javadoc for Mockito.verify(Object, VerificationMode)

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      VerificationMode description(String description)
      Description will be prepended to the assertion error if verification fails.
      void verify(VerificationData data)
      Performs the verification

      • verify

        void verify(VerificationData data)
        Performs the verification

      • description

        VerificationMode description(String description)
        Description will be prepended to the assertion error if verification fails.
        参数:
        description - The custom failure message
        返回:
        VerificationMode
        从以下版本开始:
        2.1.0
